name: Project Wrath Demo (Roguelike Deckbuilder)
description:
Alpha demo build, game is not close to complete. Spire-like / deckbuilder inspired by Slay The Spire, Griftlands, etc.

Currently, there is no 'endgame' but there is some difficulty scaling up to around level 12.

There are three playable classes all with their own unique card pool (with a small number of shared basic cards). These classes are:

  • Warrior
  • Rogue
  • Wizard

You can view the full card pool over at our fandom page (note that subclass cards are not currently accessible in game - although they do exist):

https://nomoregamesstudio.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Cards

If you encounter bugs playing the game let us know. If you can share the log file and DgmlDebug (which is generated per level played) that would be very helpful!

Please follow us on the platforms below if interested in development updates:

  • Twitter
  • Instagram
